description: Get your pork fix with this quick and easy pork mince recipe. You'll love this sticky pork served with rice noodles and tasty greens.
keywords: Sticky Pork Mince Bowls with Chinese Broccoli
name: Sticky Pork Mince Bowls with Chinese Broccoli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200 g pkt dried flat rice noodles
500 g Woolworths Heart Smart pork mince

recipeInstructions.text: Divide noodles and broccoli among bowls. Top with mince mixture and scatter over coriander to serve.
